meanings.sent1: He gonged the large metal disc to make a loud sound.
meanings.sent2: The musician gonged the instrument at the end of the performance.
meanings.sent3: The chef gonged the pan to signal that the food was ready.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's words gonged in his mind, reminding him of the importance of studying.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the gong gonged through the room, capturing everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Having been struck with a gong.
meanings.sent1: The gonged metal surface reflected the light beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The gonged area on the sculpture added an interesting texture.
meanings.sent3: The gonged bell had a unique resonance that intrigued the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her gonged necklace shimmered in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The gonged surface felt smooth to the touch, showing its quality craftsmanship.
